Title: Relates to requiring the division of state police and local police departments to notify a licensed child day care center or group day care home in the area of certain emergency situations
Summary: Requires the division of state police and local police departments to notify a licensed child day care center or group day care home in the area of certain emergency situations.
LawCode: Add ยง235, Exec L; add ยง209-uu, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the general municipal law, in relation to requiring the division of state police and local police departments to notify a licensed child day care center or group day care home in the area of certain emergency situations
